subject: Fw: Thanks for your recent refinance application, we accepted your refinance appication
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you TODAY (hurry, this deal will expire TODAY):
$478,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this simplified form... 
Do not worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
http://hodestone.com/
